content:
going to blog link will take you to the video to teach you how to make this cord there is a group all about romanian point lace now on ravelry http //www ravelry com/groups/romanian-point-lace for those that do not crochet i now have premade cord in my etsy shop but please try making it first as it isn t hard just real time consuming https //www etsy com/shop/vintagethreads/items section_id=21614450 **if you like my blog and the free patterns and tutorials and want to say thank you i have a wish list on ravelry of patterns i would like to make
thank you in advance for being kind and
saying thank you back

love sunshine but please do not feel like you have to**
